QuestData.Title: Wolf Training: Cruel Ogres
QuestData.Description: The wolves of this land are the most savage beasts I have seen, and surely do not fear orc nor ogre.$B$BBring him to bear against once of the ogres that you are familiar with. The Gorian Beast-Lasher, the one that smells of blood and fear, see how the wolf reacts to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Gorian Beast-Lasher while riding your Snarler-In-Training.
